name: wl-nfalv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))

comment: If ` x ` is not present in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` A. y ph ` . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 11-Jan-2020.)
